SEARCH
Package ComparativeGenomics.Drawing

Class Curve2D

java.lang.Object
java.awt.geom.QuadCurve2D
java.awt.geom.QuadCurve2D.Double
ComparativeGenomics.Drawing.Curve2D
All Implemented Interfaces:
Shape, Serializable, Cloneable
public class Curve2D extends QuadCurve2D.Double
Draws curves between two chromosomes in circos view to graphically indicate a translocation event. Extends the methods in java.awt.geom.QuadCurve2D.
Author:
franpeters

      Constructor with curve size and positions
      Parameters:
      x1 - x coordinate of start point
      y1 - y coordinate of start point
      x2 - x coordinate of control point
      y2 - y coordinate of control point
      x3 - x coordinate of end point
      y3 - y coordinate of end point
      info - translocation
